Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ELECTION LAW

Title: Relates to the use of campaign funds for any settlement fees, fines or penalties for sexual harassment civil or criminal actions
Summary: Prohibits the use of campaign funds to pay any settlement fees, fines or penalties for sexual harassment civil or criminal actions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the use of campaign funds to pay any settlement fees, fines or penalties for sexual harassment civil or criminal actions
